post.body: lulz!
holy suffering children!
Monk marathon continues.
Loud talking!
Fail.
Watching Movies.
I need breakfast. And a ride back to my car.
Heh. Well, this year has started... interesting. What is this person's name?
Stop one on more important business trip: Philippe the Original.
One more (half) day of "work." And then, off to more important business.
Gave up and went home. A shitty free show is still a shitty show.
Seven people on stage = seven times teh suck.
He didn't recognize me. I'm shocked. Shocked, I tell you!
Kevin Bronson in the house.
At the EchoPlex now. Some horrible Brit with an acoustic guitar just got off stage. This place is rad, though.
Ten years from now me is sitting next to me me at the bar. My future self needs a punch in the mouth.
Dinner time = Masa time. Now... to ExPlx or not to ExPlx?
Time to work. At the job I actually like, that is.
i can't say it's ever a good idea to shoot someone, but a talker at the movies? yeah, they kinda deserve it. http://tinyurl.com/9javde
watching "a shot in the dark." pure fucking genius.
